DOC.brief_summary: The purpose propose research study assess effect include great amount minimally process red meat ( lean pork beef ) Mediterranean Diet cardiometabolic emotional well-being .
DOC.brief_title: The Lean Meats Mediterranean Diet Study
DOC.detailed_description: All subject complete 18-wk randomize crossover study . Following 2-wk baseline test period assess cardiometabolic emotional well-being habitual diet , subject consume Mediterranean-style , weight-maintenance diet either restrict rich lean , minimally process red meat 5 week . Following 4-wk washout period second 2-wk baseline testing , subject consume Mediterranean Diet alternate predominant animal protein source 5 week . Cardiometabolic emotional well-being assess baseline post period .
DOC.criteria: Male female 3069 year old BMI 2537 kg/m2 Total cholesterol < 240 mg/dL Lowdensity lipoprotein < 160 mg/dL Triglycerides < 400 mg/dL Fasting glucose < 110 mg/dL Systolic blood pressure < 160 mmHg Diastolic blood pressure < 100 mmHg Body weight < 300 lb Weight stable 3 month prior ( ±10 lb ) Stable physical activity regimen 3 month prior ≤3 h/wk moderate high intensity exercise resistance aerobic train Medication use stable 6 month prior . Diabetic Smoker
